name: @govuk-frontend/bundler-integrations
description: Boilerplate to verify that GOV.UK Frontend works OK with main bundlers

scripts.rollup: npm run rollup:single-component && npm run rollup:initAll
scripts.vite: cross-env ENTRY_NAME=single-component vite build && cross-env ENTRY_NAME=initAll vite build
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run rollup" "npm run webpack" "npm run vite" --names "rollup,webpack,vite" --prefix-colors "red.dim,blue.dim,yellow.dim"
